channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Spell Slinger/Dark Artist
channel.description:
This is my first class suggestion sorry if it’s bad :stuck_out_tongue:
Spell Slinger/Dark Artist (**Unique Class**)
Spell Slinger: BD-Support
**Night Ability 1**: Protection Spell: Cast a spell of protection over a player, giving them occupy and night immunity for the night. (2 uses)
**Night Ability 2**: Portal Spell: Choose a player. Anything done to that player will be transferred to another player of your choosing. (Unlimited Uses)
**Day Ability 1**: Cleansing Spell: Player will be immune to occupation tonight. (2 Uses)
CONVERTED CLASS:
Dark Artist: Unseen-Support
**Night Ability 1**: Sabotage Spell: Sabotage someone’s abilities, getting rid of 1 use of any limited ability. (2 Uses)
**Night Ability 2**: Dark Portal: Choose an Unseen member. Any action towards them will be redirected to a random member of the Blue dragon. (Will not redirect towards King, and the redirected person will not be notified) Unlimited Uses.
**Day Ability 1**: Evil Cleanse: Assassin will become immune to occupation tonight. (1 use)
